metadata.Title: CVE-2016-1245 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description:
It was discovered that the zebra daemon in Quagga before 1.0.20161017 suffered from a stack-based buffer overflow when processing IPv6 Neighbor Discovery messages. The root cause was relying on BUFSIZ to be compatible with a message size; however, BUFSIZ is system-dependent.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-1245` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

quagga - 0.99.22.4-3ubuntu1.3
No subscription required

criterions.comment: quagga package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '0.99.22.4-3ubuntu1.3').
